definition: to patrol/to make one's rounds/classifier for rounds of drinks

sentences.english: One dead, two missing after S. Korea patrol boat sinks.
sentences.chinese: 韓國巡邏艇下沉，一人死亡，兩人失蹤。

sentences.english: The US can easily afford a new PhalanxCIWS for its new cutters.
sentences.chinese: 美國可以給它的新巡邏艇裝上新的密集陣。

sentences.english: During one journey, the fishing boat was boarded by a North Korean naval patrol.
sentences.chinese: 有一次漁船遭遇朝鮮海軍巡邏艇盤查。
